about_the_game:
OBAKENORI is a collectathon platformer inspired by the nostalgic days of early 3D gaming

Play as the once powerful demon of the Sea, Obakenroi, who has been stripped of his power and reduced to a humble onigiri. Explore vivid environments, interact with its strange inhabitants, and collect ingredients for the Chef as you aim to regain your former glory!

UNLOCK a range of abilities in the hunt for your missing Nori, the key to your strength!

COLLECT a wide range of ingredients to keep the Chef on your side (and you’ll want him on your side!)

DEFEAT enemies as you search the lands!

SHAPESHIFTING powers to shapeshift and sneak into dangerous areas!

DISCOVER secret areas with exciting enemies and puzzles!

Meet other inhabitants of the world, some who will guide you, and some who want to have your power for themselves!

OBAKENORI is in early development, so more features and info are coming soon! :)
